summary: The agent report provides a satisfactory analysis with some key elements identified, but it lacks precision in identifying the root cause and completeness in the causal chain.

dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent report identifies potential influences but fails to pinpoint the exact root cause as DDR voting mechanism.

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The report captures the DDR to VCORE link but lacks clarity on the full causal chain involving CM and CPU.

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: The report accurately identifies key metrics but misses some CPU frequency details.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The reasoning is logical but lacks depth in ruling out MMDVFS and explaining CM's role.

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.explanation: The suggested fixes are practical and relevant to the identified issues.
